playfabapi.name: PlayFab API
playfabapi.description: A plugin for the PlayFab API with support for authentication and economy.

test-property.name: Test property
test-property.desc: A test number property. Displayed by 'Alert' action.

project-id.name: Project ID
project-id.desc: The ID of your PlayFab project.

on-registered.description: Notification sent when a player registers with PlayFab.

on-authenticated.description: Notification sent when a player logs in.

on-message.description: Notification sent when a message should be shown to the user.

on-inventory-ready.description: Notification sent when the inventory is retrieved.

on-inventory-added.description: Notification sent when inventory items are added.

on-inventory-subtracted.description: Notification sent when inventory items are subtracted.

on-inventory-deleted.description: Notification sent when inventory items are deleted.

log-in-with-email.description: Log in using a player email address.

password.name: Password
password.desc: Password for the PlayFab account (6-100 characters).

login-with-playfab.description: Log in using a player username.

password.name: Password
password.desc: Password for the PlayFab account (6-100 characters).

register-playfab-user.display-text: Register a PlayFab user with email: {0}, password: {1}, username: {2}, requirebothusernameandemail: {3}, displayname: {4}

email.name: Email
email.desc: User email address attached to their account.

password.name: Password
password.desc: Password for the PlayFab account (6-100 characters)

username.name: Username
username.desc: PlayFab username for the account (3-20 characters).

requirebothusernameandemail.name: RequireBothUsernameAndEmail
requirebothusernameandemail.desc: An optional parameter that specifies whether both the username and email parameters are required. If true, both parameters are required; if false, the user must supply either the username or email parameter. The default value is true.

displayname.name: DisplayName
displayname.desc: An optional parameter for setting the display name for this title (3-25 characters).

get-inventory-items.display-text: Get inventory items with collectionId: {0}, count: {1}, and next: {2}.
get-inventory-items.description: Get the inventory items for the PlayFab player.

collectionid.name: CollectionId
collectionid.desc: The name of the item collection to use. Defaults to 'default'

count.name: Count
count.desc: The number of items to fetch between 0 - 50. Default is 50.

next.name: Next
next.desc: Should the next series of results in the list be returned.

add-inventory-items.display-text: Add inventory items with amount: {0}, itemid: {1}, collectionid: {2}, durationinseconds: {3}.
add-inventory-items.description: Add the inventory items for the PlayFab player.

amount.name: Amount
amount.desc: The amount to add for the current item.

itemid.name: Inventory item Id
itemid.desc: The inventory item id the request applies to.

collectionid.name: CollectionId
collectionid.desc: The id of the entity's collection to perform this action on. (Default='default'). The number of inventory collections is unlimited.

durationinseconds.name: DurationInSeconds
durationinseconds.desc: The duration to subtract from the current item expiration date.

subtract-inventory-items.display-text: Subtract inventory items with amount: {0}, itemid: {1}, collectionid: {2}, durationinseconds: {3}.
subtract-inventory-items.description: Subtract the inventory items for the PlayFab player.

amount.name: Amount
amount.desc: The amount to subtract for the current item.

itemid.name: Inventory item Id
itemid.desc: The inventory item id the request applies to.

collectionid.name: CollectionId
collectionid.desc: The id of the entity's collection to perform this action on. (Default='default'). The number of inventory collections is unlimited.

durationinseconds.name: DurationInSeconds
durationinseconds.desc: The duration to subtract from the current item expiration date.

delete-inventory-items.display-text: Delete inventory items with itemid: {0}, and collectionid: {1}.
delete-inventory-items.description: Delete the inventory items for the PlayFab player.

itemid.name: Inventory item Id
itemid.desc: The inventory item id the request applies to.

collectionid.name: CollectionId
collectionid.desc: The id of the entity's collection to perform this action on. (Default='default'). The number of inventory collections is unlimited.

get-account-id.description: Get the PlayFab user's account Id.

get-ready-inventory-items.description: Get the PlayFab user's inventory items.

index.name: Index
index.desc: The index of the first item to get.

count.name: Count
count.desc: The number of items to get (max 50).

isdisplay.name: Is Display String
isdisplay.desc: Should this array be formatted for display.
